website_summaries.verdict: Works well, but it is clearly an acquired taste.
pros: As the name suggests, a whey protein powder with no carbohydrates
cons: Doesn't taste as good as other brands

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great - Zero Net Carbs - good for Keto Diet
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of this product and I opted for a larger canister this time because it is so good. I didn't have high expectations, but this is really a very good-tasting product for zero net carbs. I highly recommend it for anyone on a low carb or ketogenic diet.
customer_reviews.author: April Steele

customer_reviews.title: Tastes so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked into a lot of products prior to purchasing, as I am doing keto. This protein powder tastes AMAZING! It keeps me full, totally serves its purpose. Those of you doing keto here is a good "recipe" 1.5 cup unsweetened almond milk 3 tbs heavy whipping cream 10 drops sweetleaf sweet drops 1 scoop isopure (Optional to change flavor up- 2tbs sugar free pb fit) (Optional for more healthy fats- 1tbs avocado oil) 5 cubes of ice. Mix in blender bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Except ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in 2015 when doing LC and have recently started again and bought more. I always loved the flavor (I only tried chocolate and vanilla), found it easy to stir in beverages and price is fair. Since 2015 I have learned that sucralose, aka, Splenda, isn't so healthy and I noticed Isopure still uses it. I was hoping by now they'd have begun using stevia, monk fruit, erythritol or some combo of those and ditched the sucralose. Other than that issue, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: I liked the texture of the powder but I didn't like ...
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought Isopure in the strawberry's & cream flavor. I liked the texture of the powder but I didn't like the after taste and at times it was a little hard to pass through due to the strong taste so I had to throw in a banana sometimes or peanut butter to cut the taste . I decided to go a little natural and just do the Vanilla, I loved it! much more natural taste and you don't need peanut butter or even banana's to give it a good flavor, it already tastes amazing even with just water. Although I cant wait to finish it and try the coffee one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helping me lose some pounds
customer_reviews.text: at age 41, i kept gaining weight. i didn't like myself on vacation. when i got back, as friends recommended who have taken this n the range of 10-20 years now, I jumped at the opportunity while i still felt positive about reaching a goal. a shake in the am, a shake in the afternoon, some healthier snacks and then regular dinner. when i am off, i just eat regularly as well. of course, i do watch portions i intake now. add some exercises, in 3 months i lost 20 lbs and this is even during summer when i've had some summer many vacation days off. totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good powder
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes good, especially for being so low in carbs. It tastes better with almond milk, but I've just been mixing it with water and it's fine. It's better with cold water. It does mix really well in my blender bottle, it gets all smooth and creamy with no clumps. I keep this on hand and have it right after I wake up. I'm doing the Slow Carb Diet and need 30 grams of protein in the morning within 30 minutes of waking up, so I also use a little collagen protein. It's good and it's working well. I might try a different flavor next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tisus

customer_reviews.title: Isopure Creamy vanilla - Not creamy in the least, barely has any flavor at all! Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I have been using whey isolates for about 25 years now. Just be careful with the reviews on Amazon. I think I am pretty objective, but the Vanilla cream, BARELY has any flavor to it whatsoever, in water it is NOT creamy in the least. I just want to help prevent people from making the same mistake I have by purchasing this. I cannot speak for any of the other flavors from Isopure, but I am not about to take the chance after purchasing this brand/product.
customer_reviews.author: smillma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome will order again
customer_reviews.text: I just love that this has no carbs!!! I ordered it last Friday and came very fast. The scoop was hard to find but not the providers fault probably just got buried deeper from being moved around in mail. HOWEVER!!! I made the mistake of ordering mint chocolate chip. I usually mis my protein with water for less carbs but this drink doesn't taste good, and looks like dirty water. I'm sure it's just the flavor, and I'll suffer and mix with milk for now. It taste so much better in 1/2 cup of milk and 1/2 cup of water
customer_reviews.author: Todd Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a spoiled. I opened other day when I finished the old bottle it caked instantly when put in water. It does not mixed at all. The floating thick cake is chewy and restless. I have to throw it all. Return time has expired!. What a waste of money and time. I will never order again and tell my friends about it. I need my money back and cancel the further shipments.
customer_reviews.author: jag devkota

customer_reviews.title: Worst flavor ever
customer_reviews.text: I have used this protein in the past and I liked it. Of course if combined with the right diet and exercise routine you will see results, but the taste is awful. It tastes worst every time. I just purchased the Creamy Vanilla (3 lbs) flavor and I can't wait to finish it. I attempted to make the flavor better by using almond milk instead of water and nope, it got worse. I think I'm suing. 😅
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Added vitamins, for better or worse, and relatively high sodium
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I bought the product that it contains added vitamins. That isn't necessarily a bad thing, but I would prefer that a protein powder is just that, and that I get my vitamin intake elsewhere. More importantly, I am not wild about the relatively high sodium content. In fact it actually tastes a little salty to me - but that could be my imagination. At 240mg in one serving providing 25g protein, it contains about 10% of recommended daily consumption. For comparison, another protein isolate that I use regularly contains 50mg of sodium for a similar serving.
customer_reviews.author: zeke

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein mix
customer_reviews.text: I love Zero Carb shake mix. I stir together 4 ozs unsweetened almond vanilla milk and 2 tablespoons heavy cream in the blender pitcher and sit in freezer for about 20 to 25 mins then add stevia, ice cubes, and zero carb powder and blend for 20 seconds (blenders vary). Absolutely delicious. Cal 200, Fat 10g, Net Carb 1, Protein 25.
customer_reviews.author: Southernsassy

customer_reviews.title: Isopure has been my favorite protein to use as it simply provides what your ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm personally not a fan of supplements and prefer to try and get fit by eating foods that will allow my body to learn to heal and regenerate naturally. Isopure has been my favorite protein to use as it simply provides what your body needs without adding unnecessary additives or diluting itself with carbohydrates and sugars. I can add things like fruit or oats at my own digression instead. Great for keeping yourself lean whilst still building muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Willh99

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Tastes fine when mixed with almond milk. Not that great with just water. Tastes really good with a few spoons of heavy cream. I wanted a zero carb protein since I'm on keto, but didn't want one with a terrible ingredient list which is why I chose this one. Mixes well too. I just use a spoon then a milk frother to get the little clumps. No need for a blender. Also no horrible artificial sweetener taste which is a huge plus in my book.
customer_reviews.author: sav

customer_reviews.title: throw up right after drink it
customer_reviews.text: This tastes so bad and I am really concerned if this product is legit or not. Today is my first try with this protein powder, I mixed it with cold water, before even drinking it, I noticed a very weird smell from the mixed drink, and now I just regretted ignoring the signs and swallowed it. The protein mix tastes so bad, and that's not the worst part, I throw up 10 minutes later. I am concerned if this product actually contains some harmful and unhealthy stuff in it because I don't usually throw up right after I eat or drink something unless it is bad or harmful such as when I accidentally eat bad food.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Curbs appetite, big gains.
customer_reviews.text: I only just started using this a couple weeks ago, and I can tell you a couple of things. 1) I no longer feel the need to eat late in the night if I drink a scoop of this after my evening workout. 2) I've been working out for a couple months but haven't eaten enough protein to see any noticeable gains. Could be placebo but I swear I can finally see my arms growing thicker. 3) Not nearly as bad as i thought it would be. Tastes pretty good actually.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this creamy vanilla powder. My bf has it and gave me a sample, I immediately loved it so I purchased one myself. Love the flavor of this vanilla, it’s very soft and not over powering or artificial tasting like most vanilla I’ve had in the past. Will keep using this. Great tasting and filling after my yoga sessions. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a while now and have added some solid muscle even while following a low carb diet plan. Very Happy. One thing that I have found: Prior to my low carb dieting, I was always a big fan of chocolate milk, not the super strong Chocolate but more of the Skim Milk version. I found the Dutch Chocolate Powder flavor just a bit too Chocolaty; switched to the Vanilla, and while I like it, that was a bit to Vanilla for me!. So what to do.....added 1 scoop of Vanilla with 1 scoop of Dutch Chocolate and....there it is, the exact flavor I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: John B Winters

customer_reviews.title: Taste? Ew.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I had LOW expectations due to this being a zero carb protein powder. But please listen to others when they say the taste is horrible. I tried 3 times: water, milk, and fruit with water. All three times I had to dump it down the drain. It had a bitter taste, that was off putting to the point of not being able to stomach more than a sip. I’m sure some people can/do power through the drink, but I need my protein to be at least a little palatable.
customer_reviews.author: MGH

customer_reviews.title: great flavor
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes so good! No carbs and no sugar makes this the perfect protein supplement. It mixes well with no chunking up. dissolved perfect and made the drink feel creamy instead of just something added to water. I have tried this in both milk and water and i honestly like it better with water. Great price great brand quality ingredients. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Maybe expired/Soiled Product very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the Isopure creamy Vanilla flavor for years and have always been satisfied. For the cost savings I decided to order through Amazon. The product arrived unsealed and I made my first shake this morning and there is a strange taste. I put my finger into the Isopure to verify that was the taste and it is. Has anyone else had a bad experience when ordering edible products on Amazon??
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: I was using this protein powder for about a year or so. I never had a problem with it. Great taste, zero carbs and mixes well. Unfortunately it has lots of unnecessary stuff in it that may or may not be good for you so I switched to different product. But over all decent protein powder
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not good by it's self - use as a shake
customer_reviews.text: On the taste, it's like a somewhat flavorless vanilla. Pretty much tastes, looks, and smells like powdered milk. I put two scoops in a 16 ounce glass to try that...I'm not sure what they use as a preservative, but it was almost...salty? One scoop, in 10 oz of water was quite diluted. This would be just fine mixed with berry's and some yogurt for a protein shake. By itself...well, I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: reconrover

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, no carbs Keto diet meal replace and tastes great too.
customer_reviews.author: Darthanian

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement
customer_reviews.text: I like how it’s a protein supplement and a daily vitamin in one. My only complaint is the creamy vanilla does taste like powdered milk and unless you blend it or have a shaker, then just mixing it with a spoon will not get it to be smooth completely. It’ll have a grainy texture if you try and just mix with a spoon so be wary. Other than that it’s not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia B.

customer_reviews.title: Flavors matter
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many of these isopures, and the nastiest tasting ones are the mint chocolate chip and strawberry. Best tasting is apple pie, vanilla, cookies and cream,and banana
customer_reviews.author: Kingmurt

customer_reviews.title: Metallic taste
customer_reviews.text: I have used isopure for 2 years now and managed to lose 56lbs using this protein, a healthy diet and hiit program. The flavor was great by itself or mixed with cinnamon, smoothies or even as a creamer substitute for coffee. The last time I ordered it though it had a bit of a metallic taste to it. Figured maybe it had to do with something I had ate previously but every time I’d try it again it had that strange metallic taste. Perhaps it was a bad batch? Who knows 🤷🏻‍♀️. Either if it’s mixed into a smoothie or with other ingredients I’m sure it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: BadBetty11

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, but I don’t like how it taste.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it’s not the best one. I don’t like protein flavor. This one is good but still can taste the protein flavor a little bit. Sometimes I like to make a protein smoothie but if I don’t have Frozen fruits the I would make a milkshake but because of the taste I can’t drink it just with milk.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tolentino

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: I am on Keto and this is a great meal replacement for a quick lunch. I mix with either cashew or almond milk, a tablespoon of peanut butter and either hemp hearts or chia seeds and some ice. Throw it all in a Ninja and it comes out thick and rich. It really feels like I am 'cheating' but fits macros perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Not with just plain water.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you want on Nutrition facts. Only 100 calories per 25G protein, 5g BCAA , 4g L-Glutamine, all of this per 1 scoop. I prefer cold water with all my powedered wheys. However the taste is so empty and watered down with just cold water. Might have to use 1% milk to add flavor. I'm sure it would be best to mix with fruits and such
customer_reviews.author: TommyNYC

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the taste it's bitter, foul smelling
customer_reviews.text: I've tasted several protein powders before but this one is straight out of baby formula. The flavor is awful and the smell isn't any better. I would never try it again. I really wish I had one with another flavor
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Cant stomach the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Not my cup of tea. The vanilla reminds me of the milk left over after eating captin crunch ceral. If i add fruit its like fruity pebbles milk. Yuk You might try buying a small or single packet before buying the big jug
customer_reviews.author: B. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE SMELL/TASTE
customer_reviews.text: So at first this was so delicious! Then, it started tasting really really bad and smelling really bad. Like straight chemicals. I contacted the company, they sent out a replacement. Same thing. Tasted and smelled so bad! Now I have two which I can’t use because it smells terrible. They must’ve changed something because the very first one I ordered was perfect! Or they’re sending bad, spoiled items. I have two 3lb tubs. Both are going to go to waste. What a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Rip Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great protein quality, flavor is so-so.
customer_reviews.text: I got the vanilla flavor. Not my favorite vanilla flavor, but not the worst. Dissolves easily in lactose free milk. I usually take 3 scoops with 20oz of lactose free milk during and after a workout - I am definitely getting more protein into my diet, and my stomach pains, bloating and gassiness have completely gone away. I also usually take psyllium husk with this product since it doesn't have any fiber, which I think helps better with digestion. Overall the quality of the protein is great, and if you want to add protein to your diet - this is definitely a superior product. I am going try the chocolate next time though.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Quality powder for the cost
customer_reviews.text: What I ask for in a protein powder - 1) Works well in shakes, milk and water 2) Dissolves relatively well even if just spooned in and stirred 3) High protein content by weight 4) Tastes relatively sweet without high carb count per serving What I got in this powder - 4 out of 4.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Is this the original product?
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about if this is original or not, I got the cap plastic sealed but there was no paper cap, is that normal ? Also it tastes and look different than ones I used to buy.
customer_reviews.author: ShikaZ

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff...
customer_reviews.text: I have gone thru my first 3lb container of this. I use it in my daily protein smoothies. It is such a great way to get more protein in my diet. I add pumpkin, protein powder, unsweetened almond milk, banana, cinnamon, and lots of ice. It is so good and it takes away my desire for something sweet. This powder has zero sugar and I don't even need to add any sugar to my smoothies. I have already ordered more of this product. I recommend you try it. Thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: Annee

customer_reviews.title: Foamy and frothy
customer_reviews.text: Like-blends easily. Dislike the mild vanilla flavor and the foamy, frothy texture.
customer_reviews.author: caladesta

customer_reviews.title: Best protein, awesome all around.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to digest, easy to blend. With my normal fitness routine I noticed improvements in my body shape not achieved prior to start this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cres T. Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Product inconsistent on recent shipment. But normally good
customer_reviews.text: This product is normally very good however my most recent shipment from subscribe and save had something a little off. The product seemed slightly different. It normally mixes very easily and is a fine powder. This shipment the powder was more course and smelt off. It doesn't mix into liquid as easily as it usually does. Hoping this is a one off thing as I normally have no problems with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and DELICIOUS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our family’s favorite protein. It is absolutely delicious and blends well with pretty much anything. Don’t waste money on anything else. This one is great quality with the delicious flavor!
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pound of creamy vanilla just to try it. I mix 2 scoops with about 1/4 cup of heavy cream, tablespoon of MCT oil, few drops of ez sweets and the fill it up with unsweetened vanilla almond milk in my shaker bottle, no lumps mixes well, it’s good and I will be buying the 3lb container for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nuwan sampath

customer_reviews.title: Protein with Zero carbs
customer_reviews.text: I simply adore this protein shake. It is very simple to mix with water. No lumps or sticking to the bottom of your cup. I find it tastes better with chilled water, which by the way, is the only recommended liquid to use. Great tasting and we'll worth the 💰
customer_reviews.author: Dr. TP Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I have been using protein powders for breakfast for almost a year now. This has helped me lose some weight, and makes breakfast so much easier. The taste is great, and it mixes much better than the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jakebee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Isopure has always been a great brand. This dissolves incredibly easy in water and tastes okay. The price on Amazon is very good compared to any local health store as well as any of the big online stores. This also has lower cholesterol than a lot of other brands out there. If you are a serious lifter and take 2 or 3 protein shakes a day, the cholestorol in a lot of these other brands is pretty scary! And of course, the lack of a lot of carbohydrates is a huge plus for Isopure. You just can't go wrong with this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: and it mixes well and tastes great. The only thing keeping it from being a ...
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of green smoothies, and because my diet is mainly vegetarian, I worry that I don't get enough protein. I add this protein powder to every smoothie, and it mixes well and tastes great. The only thing keeping it from being a five-star review is that I would rather it didn't contain sucralose. (I'm reviewing the Zero Carb Creamy Vanilla flavor.) One note: if you add this to your smoothie and you use the Nutribullet, don't use more than half of a scoop or it foams up and can cause the cup to leak while blending. Other than that, it works great and blends awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Ione

customer_reviews.title: New taste, absolutely rank.
customer_reviews.text: Been a happy customer of this powder for years, last tub I bought tasted awful. Chalky, caustic, almost smoky vibe going on, really inedible flavour. It even prevails when mixed with fruits or peanut butter, and even repeats on you. Amazon promptly replaced it, same with the second tub. Don't know if it's a new recipe or just a bad batch, taking it up with the company now. Hope it's a one off batch, otherwise I'll be shopping around for a new brand which I can't be bothered with.
customer_reviews.author: fragma99

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Isopure 50g protein product and got the zero carb one and because I was starting Ketogains and a workout I had to keep what was sent. I hope the next time I order I can get the correct product cuz its not cheap and I want what I pay for!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Creamy Vanilla
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product the other day and it was.... odd. I followed instructions on suggested mixing. And I smelled vanilla, but with absolutely no sweetness. It kind of made me nauseous. But I have 3lbs to chug through so lesson learned. Maybe I got a bad batch. At this time I would not recommend the Creamy Vanilla flavor.
customer_reviews.author: LesB

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like powdered cardboard
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst god awful flavored protein on this planet. Its hard to choke down and I cannot believe I have 42 more servings to go. Mixing with water is so far the worst, tried whole milk this morning with just slightly better results. I'll take the carbs in the future
customer_reviews.author: Chayne K.

customer_reviews.title: Worst taste.
customer_reviews.text: I have tasted many protein powders in my life. I bought this one because it was a 3lb container for $30 so I said why not. With zero carbs and no sugar it was quite apparent. There was a heavy salt after taste that did not mix well with my body. I am quite unsure as to why it was this way.
customer_reviews.author: TJ B.

customer_reviews.title: this adds a nice vanilla flavor and has good protein for pre-post exercise
customer_reviews.text: I put a scoop of this with my morning and evening fruit smoothie, this adds a nice vanilla flavor and has good protein for pre-post exercise. If you use this as a stand a lone product I suggest a blender as shaking or stirring will not dissolve the powder completely in my opinion. This also goes well with Almond milk. Recommend for anyone who is physically active.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Was turned on to this product from a Keto recipe blog and was excited to try it in my coffee as suggested. The photo only shows a small amount but the protein powder globbed up into hard pieces the consistency of cork board. I added a TBSP of powder and about a TBSP of these globs came up to the top. Can't image what this stuff does inside your body. Very disappointed and now have a giant container of useless protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: ereep

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed but full container?
customer_reviews.text: It seems like legit container but it wasn’t sealed when I twisted off the cap, for my last container isopure had a sealed paper like barrier that I had to peel off, did someone not like it then return it and now their just reselling it? Seems a little sketchy, I don’t really want to use something that someone else has possibly contaminated, or maybe they just don’t seal this flavor of protein? Anyways seems a little weird, don’t get me wrong generally isopure is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fine
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of Isopure. I first bought the unflavored and really liked that it gave a frothier texture to the smoothies. This is my first flavored powder and it does not make it as frothy as the unflavored. The taste is fine, just wish it frothed up creamier like the unflavored.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer 123

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mix
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great flavor for protein. I mixed every morning with instant coffee to make a delicious coffee smoothie! Mixed very well and for the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bollenbacher

customer_reviews.title: You get your moneys worth
customer_reviews.text: It has a strong flavor but, it dose a good job when bulking and helps on recovery. Would recommend if you workout at least 5 days a week and it’s nice to to add to smoothies and other things when bulking. Not very good with water but, if that’s all you have it’s not the worst taste out there.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is to be desired, but good mixability and quality
customer_reviews.text: Over-all impressed with the product. Price per serving is a bit steep, but it gets the job done. Flavor is.... terrible ... just plain out terrible on its own. This is NOT a protein powder to mix with water and drink. I tend to make a smoothie replacement drink with 1/2 cup of oats, a banana, and a hand full of frozen dark cherries with a scoop of this powder. In smoothies, this stuff is amazing, mixed in well, no chalk, just easy going protein.
customer_reviews.author: Zerocool

customer_reviews.title: Taste delicious
customer_reviews.text: I use this protein powder for over 5 years I never get bored i loved to blend with fruits sometimes with veggies like kale and spinach just delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protien
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best protein shake. You can also blend it with fruit or juice. We used to purchase theu body building but I think that will change as the delivery is much faster with prime.
customer_reviews.author: trista4120

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well and tastes good in smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I put it in smoothies and it mixes well and I can’t taste it. Has helped me to lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two thumb up
customer_reviews.text: I LITERALLY cannot go back to any other brand (I've tried)! I'm telling you, if you're questioning buying this or not, just do yourself a favor, save your time looking anywhere else and just buy this already! The flavor, ingredients, quality, and even the way it blends is superior than any other brand. This is what perfection looks like. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product, am on intermittent fasting about 20 hours a day for last 5 month, dropped almost 40 pounds and 18% body fat. I work out on empty stomach and breaking the fast only can be done without fat or carbs and sugar. Best way is to break a fast is pure protein. This powder allows you to maintain fasting and get grear nutritional benefits after fasting. Grear Flavor,
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: Great powder
customer_reviews.text: It like the taste. It mixes well. I put a raw egg and mix it with milk and water. Blend it. I can also use a shaker and it mixes easily. I like the taste of the vanilla. It's smooth, creamy. No bad after taste. I'm ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty and very sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I love IsoPure and was looking to try something that was lighter and less of a "shake". This drink checked that box for me. If you've got a sweet-tooth, this is the drink for you. I personally love this and the pineapple flavor shines through but if you're not into sweet drinks, this may not be the best option for you. Can't wait to try the other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: NOT disgusting, excellent consistency, flavor decent.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how thin this powder turns when mixed. That caused concern until it became evident it was providing exactly as promised based on my gains. The flavor is good relative to the product, the price is great. This is now my goto protein supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Maslowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Zero carb so you can't really complain. Everyone said the cookies n cream was the best so I got it. My girlfriend won't drink it because it's gross to her. To me, it's decent. Not amazing not horrible. Probably will try chocolate or vanilla next time. This brand also blends much smoother than other proteins I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Mix with OJ
customer_reviews.text: Always been a fan of the vanilla. Glad to find it on Amazon for a good price. Mix it with orange juice! Fantastic. I use it post workout. Low carb, but I have a bit of chocolate with it so the sugar/cocoa raises my insulin to allow the protein to enter my muscle cells. Post workout treat for my efforts!
customer_reviews.author: vector_func

customer_reviews.title: Sugar is the silent killer
customer_reviews.text: Love the no carb option for protein. The best option for keto hands down. I use it in my coffee daily with MCT oil and love it. The only issue is that if poured all at once it will glob together and not mix fully. Not a killer. The pros far outweigh the one con.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Elias

customer_reviews.title: A great workout addition
customer_reviews.text: I'm 56, have always worked out, lift weights, etc. But for the past few years felt I was loosing ground. I'm not a supplement guy but diet and food choice wasn't helping. I only take one scoop after a work out and after a week started feeling better and stronger. I mix with water and the vanilla flavor taste good.
customer_reviews.author: A P Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best tasting protein powder I have ever tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best tasting protein powder I have ever tried in my life. Can be mixed with anything and the texture stays consistent. Best results I've had was mixing two scoops of this with soy milk, a banana, and peanut butter. Doesn't even come out super thick as you think it would.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality protein.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great quality protein, good vanilla taste, and NO CARBS! I'm recovering from a major surgery so I need a lot of protein each day. This is working great. Drop a scoop in a magic bullet blender with whole milk and some frozen strawberries and blueberries and it's an excellent protein shake!
customer_reviews.author: TDI Photo

customer_reviews.title: Why it taste so bad??? Whyyyyy?????
customer_reviews.text: Waaaooo, the taste is awful!!!! The good thing is that after you use it you wont be hungry for a very long time, and no carbs which is great, but the flavor is horrible. Im not buying this again cause i suffer every time i have to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Estevez

customer_reviews.title: Delicious high protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein powder I have tried. Delicious sweet vanilla flavor and high quantity protein per serving. Great mixed in water, no need to mix with milk or add flavors. That said, My favorite recipe is 4 scoops isopure, 10 oz water, 1 diced peach cup (no sugar added fruit), 1/2 cup vanilla greek yogurt and 2 ice cubes. 3 tbls splenda if you want sweeter. That's about 300 cals and 70 gms protein. Great way to get in your daily protein if you've had bariatric surgery.
customer_reviews.author: J from Nevada

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy vanilla
customer_reviews.text: The vanilla flavor is awful. It was really sickly sweet and reminded me of curdled milk with sugar added. Stopped drinking after several weeks of forcing myself to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to drink but not tasty.
customer_reviews.text: Creamy Vanilla this is not. Least flavorful powder I have ever tasted. Easy to get down and doesn’t hurt my stomach (had weight loss surgery)
customer_reviews.author: Margarita A.

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, mixed well with no clumps
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is ok, not too sweet and stirs into water/milk without needing a blender bottle/shaker ball (you only need a spoon!) I prefer the vanilla to mix with a larger variety of foods (powdered pb, berries, etc) but the chocolate was a good flavor also
customer_reviews.author: Erin Obenreder

customer_reviews.title: Great No Carb Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Two scoops in almond or coconut milk in my NutriBullet makes a great meal. Add some ice cubes before blending and it makes a thick and creamy shake.
customer_reviews.author: Byra Tanks

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several protein powders yet I always end up coming back to this one. It blends beautifully and doesn't gave that grainy texture that other brands do. I mix two scoops with half a frozen banana, soymilk, and various add ins depending on what I feel like and it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It’s the bomb!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite for when I’m doing keto! It’s clean, lean and packed with protein!!!! And the vanilla flavor it great, I get the same flavor every time and I like to mix different fruits with it or just add some peanut!
customer_reviews.author: Aneisa

customer_reviews.title: Great For Those With Lactose Intolerance
customer_reviews.text: I have bad lactose intolerance. Many products which claim to be lactose free still bother me. This product tastes good (it has a very mild vanilla flavoring) and it does not bother my stomach at all. I basically use this as a substitute for skim milk. I normally have a glass with breakfast, and sometimes after weight training workout. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I don't love things. I like things or or I don't. I like this stuff alot. It was the first step on getting myself back into the gym after two years of doing nothing. I have a protein shake every day. Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for Keto
customer_reviews.text: This is a great snack for the Keto diet. It also gives us the protein we need for the diet which we do not get enough from the food we eat. Tastes good
customer_reviews.author: Google shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best protein, period!
customer_reviews.text: After over 8 years of working out, both crossfit and gym rat style, I have yet to find a protein I like better. The taste is mild enough to handle day after day (bold flavors tend to start to taste terrible after constant use), and the ingredients are excellent. There are some overpriced, specialized proteins out there, but this will always be my go to.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Russell II

customer_reviews.title: mixes well, tastes fine
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a shaker with a mixing ball, along with coffee and cream in the mornings, it works really well, I'm a satisfied repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: dejo

customer_reviews.title: F***ing Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is zero carb! I mix it in my dark roast coffee and blend up my keto ingredients! LOVE This one!
customer_reviews.author: marieanaminia

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with latest purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just received my third container of this product. The first two were great. The protein powder had a wonderful taste, blends well and great ingredients. Unfortunately, this recent batch tastes like burnt rubber. I saw another reviewer mention this so there must be some issues. I asked and received a refund. I'll be trying another brand since the quality control from this company seems poor.
customer_reviews.author: TXguy

customer_reviews.title: Flavor has changed, not good!
customer_reviews.text: Not good anymore, what the heck happened? I will not buy this product again, very disappointing. Used to be like a vanilla milkshake, now not much flavor at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: best water mixed protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein powder I've ever tried because it can be mixed in water and still taste good. That is the biggest impression a protein powder can make to me. :) I can have it as a breakfast on the go and not rack up on calories and carbs like I would with milk mixed powders. I wish it were cheaper though. :)
customer_reviews.author: AshleyMelia

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I put my protein powder in my smoothie everyday. If not I have it on its own with water. Absolutely love this product. I constantly order it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Fast absorbing
customer_reviews.text: Vest low carb high protein powder I’ve found! Super smooth and tastes great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Creamy" would not be how I would describe it.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived quickly and as described/pictured. The flavor "creamy vanilla" is anything but creamy but i understand given it is a zero carb mixture. The taste is not something that would prevent me from buying it, and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: For my money the best tasting Vanilla out there
customer_reviews.text: For my money the best tasting Vanilla out there. Zero Carbs if you count... although others list low carb counts too. Also like the Dutch Chocolate and Banana. Mix with sugar free Almond Milk, plain or vanilla instead of water for thicket richer shake and still low carb but very high in calcium. Instead of buying the chocolate I add sugar free baker's coco (1g carb) and one Splenda for a creamy chocolate post work out shake.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Shake EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein powder that I have ever tasted! I blended this up with water, ice and 1 cup of coconut milk it’s so creamy! Some days I add a little cinnamon powder!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff- not sticky sweet
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite brands of low carb protein powder. I really love this brand, and the vanilla flavor is actually a perfect base. This flavor is not super sticky sweet- one of the reasons I like it.
customer_reviews.author: JML Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: The best protein for no carb no sugar!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so picky when it comes to protein powder! I love this stuff and it’s all I buy! Blends up great or I can even mix with milk and make chocolate milk if I’m in a rush and don’t want to make a smoothy! Plus lots of great vitamins makes my hair grow soooo fast, just a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein! I add it to my morning breakfast smoothie and it makes it super creamy without having that overpowering protein taste!
customer_reviews.author: John & Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if...
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is okay, I wish it was a little sweeter. Also it is terrible at blending by hand, has to be done with a blender otherwise there are chunks most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rom85

customer_reviews.title: Not the best flavor
customer_reviews.text: This felt a little flavorless compared to other flavors in the collection. However, it filled me up and was blendable.
customer_reviews.author: R.Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve listened to the other comments the vanilla is disgusting and even when mixed with other powders (mixed in a meal replacement powder to help with the flavor) the taste still lingers. I like the idea of a no carb powder and I don’t like to waste so I’ll finish the container but I am NEVER buying this flavor again. Maybe I’ll try the tasteless one or chocolate hopefully those are better 🤢
customer_reviews.author: jason hanna

product_meta.title: Isopure Zero Carb, Vitamin C and Zinc for Immune Support, 25g Protein, Keto Friendly Protein Powder, 100% Whey Protein Isolate, Flavor: Creamy Vanilla, 3 Pounds (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Vanilla| Size:3 Pound (Pack of 1)Pack in powerfully pure protein, without packing on the carbs. Our 100% whey protein isolate powders amp you up, without any unwanted weight. Just pick your level: zero carb or low-carb (which also has zero sugar), both with 25 grams of protein per scoop. It's 100% whey protein isolate loaded with vitamins, minerals and nutrients to keep you going strong—and always without gluten, lactose, or any impurities. Made with our complete microfiltration process to be the only completely clear milk protein when dissolved in water. Available in a range of delicious flavors to mix up some seriously delicious and dynamic recipes.When to consume - post workout or other strenuous activity. First thing in the morning. Between meals
feature_bullets: Vitamin C and Zinc Provides Immune Support along with Vitamin E
100% WHEY PROTEIN ISOLATE - a high-quality protein source providing 25g per serving to support muscle building and recovery
ZERO/LOW CARB OPTIONS- helps for those watching their calorie intakes
A PERFECT FIT - supports your active lifestyle and can be used post-workout, between meals, along with a healthy breakfast, or any time of day
Added Vitamin & Mineral Blend. Note: Powders have a vitamin/mineral premix which is not soluble; they will be cloudy when dissolved
KETO-FRIENDLY - this protein powder can help support your ketogenic macros

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
